question: Haematite, magnetite, limonite and siderite are types of which mineral?
explanation:
Iron is one of the most important metals of the modern age and it is extracted from a
number of ores.
However, the commercial production comes only from four types of ores namely:
Haematite (Fe203)
Magnetite (Fe304)
Limonite and
Siderite (FeC03).
